Dividends declared:Linde India announced a dividend of ₹12 per equity share for the financial year ending March 31, 2025. This includes a special dividend of ₹7.50 per share, declared on May 23, 2025.

Secretarial auditors appointed:On May 23, 2025, the company announced the appointment of M/s P Sarawagi & Associates, Company Secretaries, as their Secretarial Auditors for a term of 5 consecutive years, effective April 1, 2025.

Upcoming AGM:The company announced on May 23, 2025, that the 89th Annual General Meeting (AGM) was scheduled for August 14, 2025.

Financial results:Linde India's standalone March 2025 net sales were Rs 591.88 crore, down 6.06% year-on-year.

Minority shareholder concerns:A group of minority investors have been actively engaged with Linde India regarding the allocation of a potentially lucrative business to its unlisted joint venture partner.

SAT directs cooperation:The Securities Appellate Tribunal (SAT) directed Linde to cooperate with a valuation exercise ordered by SEBI in connection with the minority shareholder concerns,

Market Performance:The stock had underperformed the market over the last year, with a 13.44% decline compared to the BSE500 index's negative return of -1.56%.
